insurance_company.description: Insurance company name and phone number

relationship_to_subscriber.description: Patient's relationship to subscriber (self, spouse, child)

patient_eligible.description: Is the patient currently eligible for benefits

in_network.description: Is the dental practice in network with this plan

plan_type.description: Plan type: PPO, HMO, or DMO

claims_mailing_address.description: Claims mailing address for paper claims

payor_id.description: Payor ID for electronic claims submission

annual_maximum.description: Annual maximum benefit amount in dollars

maximum_used.description: Amount of annual maximum already used this year

maximum_applies_to.description: Which categories the annual maximum applies to (e.g. Preventive, Basic, Major)

deductible_met.description: Has the annual deductible been met

deductible_amount_met.description: Dollar amount of deductible met so far

deductible_applies_to.description: Which categories the deductible applies to (e.g. Basic, Major)

waiting_period_preventive.description: Waiting period for preventive services (e.g. None, 6 months)

missing_tooth_clause.description: Is there a missing tooth clause (won't cover replacing teeth missing before policy start)

history_bwx.description: Date bitewing x-rays were last done

history_pano.description: Date panoramic x-ray was last done

history_d0150.description: Date D0150 comprehensive exam was last done

history_d0120.description: Date D0120 periodic exam was last done

history_d0140.description: Date D0140 limited exam was last done

exams_share_frequency.description: Do D0150, D0120, and D0140 share frequency with each other

history_d1110.description: Date D1110 prophy was last done

coverage_d4346.description: D4346 scaling in presence of generalized moderate/severe gingival inflammation coverage percentage

d4346_shares_with_d1110.description: Does D4346 share frequency with D1110 prophylaxis

fluoride_age_limit.description: Age limit for fluoride coverage (e.g. under 16)

downgrade_fillings.description: Does insurance downgrade resin/composite fillings to amalgam

downgrade_crowns.description: Does insurance downgrade crown materials (e.g. porcelain to metal)

frequency_crowns.description: Crown replacement frequency (e.g. once every 5 years)

frequency_d4341.description: D4341 SRP (4+ teeth per quadrant) frequency

history_d4341.description: Date D4341 SRP was last done

frequency_d4342.description: D4342 SRP (1-3 teeth per quadrant) frequency

history_d4342.description: Date D4342 SRP was last done

coverage_d6010.description: D6010 implant body surgical placement coverage percentage

coverage_d6057.description: D6057 custom fabricated abutment coverage percentage

coverage_d6058.description: D6058 abutment supported porcelain/ceramic crown coverage percentage

notes.description: Any additional notes, limitations, exclusions, or important information from the call
